text: Follow the game and NFT collection announcements

Launch of a large-scale draw. On the threshold of the collection mint on Ethereum, we are launching RAFFLE, where 5,000 people will be able to win access to a closed sale and be the first to get NFT at the best price

Mint of a generative collection of 11,264 NFTs on the Ether blockchain. Every NFT owner will be among the first to have access to Shaolin Soccer and will be the first to use all available features of the game! Also, everyone who joined the game among the first users will receive unique gifts from the developers and become a member of various AIRDROPs that will be available only to NFT holders

Official launch of the first version of the cross-chain game for web browsers and telegram. All collection holders will be given access to take part in the game and upgrade their player among the first. In the first version of the game, penalty mechanics and the ability to upgrade your player will be available.

Start of a PVP mode. At this stage, we are introducing a competition mode between players. Now each of you will be able to test your strength and fight with other users. Before each game, you can place a bet, and if you win, it will multiply your winnings and earning. Take part in competitions, upgrade your football player and earn on your victories!

Launch of several GENESIS collections with various loot boxes, legendary football players and coaches. The following few collections will expand the possibilities of the game and open up new interaction mechanics

Launch of a large-scale draw. On the threshold of the collection mint on Ethereum, we are launching RAFFLE, where 5,000 people will be able to win access to a closed sale and be the first to get NFT at the best price

This is the first free-to-earn multi-layered cross-chain PVP-game based on TON with the option to choose a role –
Player or Investor
Play football with friends and earn when your team wins
Build a unique football player and sell it on the NFT marketplace
Use super strikes to crush defenders and goalkeeper
Find the missing team, incl. players of the legendary Argentina national team 1986 with Diego Maradona!
Kick 2 Earn mechanics: improve the parameters of a football player by improving your kick in the real world with Adidas, Xiaomi or DribbleUp smart balls
Move 2 Earn mechanics: improve the strength and speed of your football player by buying virtual boots and running in the real world
Earn money at your own stadium by renting it out for top matches
Rent out your football player and earn income
Become an investor of the team and earn a percentage of the income for winning
Earn money on tickets sold and advertising by sponsors
Use your referral link and earn money by selling match tickets if you have a YouTube, twitch or other channel.
Follow the game and NFT collection announcements
NFT football players are a unique way to have the strongest and most expensive player. We are ready to open a unique NFT store where you can buy or sell:

You can build your own unique football player who will have unique characteristics and then sell it on the NFT marketplace
besides, you can also separately make up your uniform and hairstyle
You can build your own unique football player who will have unique characteristics and then sell it on the NFT marketplace

It will allow you to grow the strongest and most highly-skilled football player. You can also improve a football player's parameters by buying boosts in the NFT store or gaining new skills for the gaming experience. It allows you to make your football player the best defender, like Raphael Varane, the fastest forward, like Ronaldo or an impenetrable goalkeeper, like Buffon.
Follow the game and NFT collection announcements

Don't want to invest a lot of money, but just want to play? Challenge other teams, win, improve the players' experience, their strength, speed and kick and get free upgrades of performance, new super kicks and uniforms!

Join with other players into teams, come up with your own recognizable style of players and participate in special tournaments! Besides, you can be personally called up to the National Team to play at the World Cup.
Rent out a football player, buy stadiums and produce resources. Announce matches on the social networks, Youtube or Twitch and earn income by selling tickets for the match!
Improve the players in the game, teach them super kicks, buy them boosts on the marketplace, train them with a coach and get the maximum uniqueness!
Win the Champions League or the World Cup and get huge cash prizes!
